briefdescription.para: default clock for throttled log messages.
whether to send drive messages to the vehicle.
time delay penalty for the path planner.
lateral step size for road width sampling (m).
field of view for path planning (degrees).
field of view for lidar scan (degrees).
factor for reducing speed when no path is found.
weight factor for the last lateral displacement.
weight factor for the last lateral displacement.
maximum number of lap statistics to store.
Starting strip for the lap performance tracker in percentage.
